mapper.sql: id, personnel_no, name, once_name, sex, marriage_status, birth_date, native_place, register_residence, dwelling_type, dwelling, weight, height, blood_type, natives, diploma, professional, graduation_school, graduation_date, english_ability, computer_ability, mobile, home_phone, email, group_id, work_type, duty, position_type, position_serial, position, position_level, join_date, personnel_status, foregin, person_type, work_address, position_code, duty_level, card_type, card_name, card_no, delete_flag, remark, create_personnel_no, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO domain_employee_info ( id, personnel_no, name, once_name, sex, marriage_status, birth_date, native_place, register_residence, dwelling_type, dwelling, weight, height, blood_type, natives, diploma, professional, graduation_school, graduation_date, english_ability, computer_ability, mobile, home_phone, email, group_id, work_type, duty, position_type, position_serial, position, position_level, join_date, personnel_status, foregin, person_type, work_address, position_code, duty_level, card_type, card_name, card_no, delete_flag, remark, create_personnel_no, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.personnel_no}, #{item.name}, #{item.once_name}, #{item.sex}, #{item.marriage_status}, #{item.birth_date}, #{item.native_place}, #{item.register_residence}, #{item.dwelling_type}, #{item.dwelling}, #{item.weight}, #{item.height}, #{item.blood_type}, #{item.natives}, #{item.diploma}, #{item.professional}, #{item.graduation_school}, #{item.graduation_date}, #{item.english_ability}, #{item.computer_ability}, #{item.mobile}, #{item.home_phone}, #{item.email}, #{item.group_id}, #{item.work_type}, #{item.duty}, #{item.position_type}, #{item.position_serial}, #{item.position}, #{item.position_level}, #{item.join_date}, #{item.personnel_status}, #{item.foregin}, #{item.person_type}, #{item.work_address}, #{item.position_code}, #{item.duty_level}, #{item.card_type}, #{item.card_name}, #{item.card_no}, #{item.delete_flag}, #{item.remark}, 'admin', #{item.create_time}, #{item.update_time} )
